personalInfo.name: Sebastian Romero Laguna
personalInfo.title: Software Engineer | Backend & Cloud Specialist
personalInfo.summary:
Experienced and versatile Software Engineer with a professional background since 2017, specializing in backend development, cloud infrastructure, and automation. Proven expertise in building scalable systems using Go, Python, AWS, and Terraform, complemented by strong full-stack capabilities in TypeScript and React/Next.js. 
 Recently completed a Master of IT (graduating December 2025), adding advanced academic knowledge in cybersecurity and Artificial Intelligence to a foundation of extensive hands-on experience. A proven leader with a track record of mentoring junior developers and driving projects from conception to deployment in agile environments.

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.subtitle: My journey, my passion, and what drives me.

cards.title: My Ambition
cards.content: I am driven by a passion for solving complex problems through elegant code. I thrive in environments where I can continuously learn and apply new technologies to build meaningful products, contributing to a forward-thinking company in Australia.

cards.title: Why Backend & Cloud?
cards.content: I specialize in backend and cloud technologies because I am fascinated by the architecture of scalable, resilient systems. Engineering the core logic and infrastructure that powers applications is where I find the most engaging challenges.

cards.title: Continuous Learning
cards.content: My journey in tech is one of perpetual learning. Completing my Master's in IT, focusing on AI and Cybersecurity, is a testament to my commitment to staying at the forefront of technology and refining my craft.

experience.description: Contract role following a successful internship to continue developing premium features.
achievements: Developed new features to offer premium content under a subscription model.
Collaborated with the lead engineer to integrate new services into the existing cloud architecture.

experience.description: A pivotal internship that provided deep, hands-on involvement with enterprise-level cloud engineering, security, and DevOps practices.
achievements: Authored foundational technical guides and Architectural Decision Records (ADRs) for cloud infrastructure.
Automated cloud infrastructure provisioning and management using Terraform.
Developed a reusable framework for troubleshooting Kubernetes pod readiness and liveness probe failures.
Enhanced cloud security by implementing AWS Backup with Multi-party Approval (MPA) policies.

experience.description: Contributed to backend services and developer tooling for a global PaaS provider. Note: This role includes two tenures (Jan 2023 – July 2023 and July 2024 – Present).
achievements: Develop and maintain critical backend microservices and command-line interface (CLI) tools using Go.
Design and implement data visualization components that provide adaptive, CEO-level insights into key performance indicators.
Collaborate within a global, agile team, utilising CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions and Terraform for automated deployments to AWS.
Actively participate in code reviews to ensure high-quality, maintainable, and scalable code.

experience.description: Provide information and advice to prospective students interested in studying at CQUniversity.
achievements: Help students choose their degrees by understanding their background and areas of interest.
Represent the university at events and online forums.

experience.description: Led the backend development for a comprehensive tourism management platform.
achievements: Architected and developed the core backend services using a microservices architecture built with Go, Gin, and GORM.
Engineered a secure user authentication and Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) system from scratch.
Deployed and managed containerised applications using Docker on AWS.

experience.description: Awarded a competitive 'Researcher and Innovator Youth Scholarship' by Minciencias Colombia to conduct research abroad, focusing on data analysis and optimization algorithms.
achievements: Contributed to a significant data analysis project on COVID-19 risk factors in Colombia.
Developed and presented research findings at Salisbury University's 'Posters on the Bay' symposium.
Gained practical experience in data analysis, machine learning, and formal academic presentation.

experience.description: Spearheaded web development initiatives for a major regional newspaper.
achievements: Led the development and launch of a new e-commerce channel, which directly contributed to a 50% increase in platform revenue.
Implemented strategic performance and SEO optimisations that successfully expanded the user base by 2.4 million.
Collaborated with stakeholders to translate business requirements into technical solutions using PHP, JavaScript, and SQL.

experience.description: Led a team in developing web and mobile platforms for various clients.
achievements: Transitioned client systems from paper-based to modern web-based management solutions.
Designed and implemented a role-based access platform for enterprise applications.

projects.title: Serverless Static Website Deployment
projects.description: Developed a fully serverless static website leveraging AWS. The architecture includes a Lambda function for form processing and CloudFront CDN for global content delivery. Created a custom deployment script to automate updates for both the Lambda function and the website content in a single execution.

projects.title: Hyperparameter Optimization for Image Classification
projects.description: Investigated and compared three Hyperparameter Optimization (HPO) methods – PSO, Grid Search, and Random Search – for optimizing CNN hyperparameters using PyTorch for binary image classification.

projects.title: Risk Factor Data Analysis for Sars Cov 2 Patients
projects.description: Analyzed COVID-19 risk factors in Colombia using Big Data technologies to identify comorbidities associated with patients, providing insights for health professionals.

projects.title: Lingua Verse
projects.description: A language learning application designed to help users expand their vocabulary through interactive quizzes and spaced repetition.

projects.title: Bakery Invoice Generator
projects.description: A full-stack web application to streamline invoicing for small businesses, featuring dynamic invoice creation and PDF generation.

projects.title: AI/ML Model Implementation Portfolio
projects.description: A portfolio of projects focused on implementing models from scratch, including a Particle Swarm Optimization for CNNs.

education.description: Focusing on advanced topics in cybersecurity, cloud computing, and artificial intelligence.

education.institution: Fundación Escuela Tecnológica de Neiva 'Jesús Oviedo Pérez'
education.description: Completed a comprehensive engineering program with a focus on software development principles and practices.
Early research and development program focusing on foundational web technologies.

professionalDevelopment.title: Professional Development in Cybersecurity (120 Hours)
professionalDevelopment.institution: Fundación Escuela Tecnológica de Neiva 'Jesús Oviedo Pérez'
professionalDevelopment.description: Completed an intensive program on foundational cybersecurity principles, including implementing governance, cloud security on AWS, and network security.

professionalDevelopment.title: English as a Second Language (ESL Program)
professionalDevelopment.description: Completed an intensive English language program to achieve professional fluency for working in an international environment.

certifications.title: Work Smarter, Not Harder: Time Management
Introduction to AWS Course: Fundamentals of Cloud Computing
Test Of English as a Foreign Language IBT
Linear Regression with NumPy and Python
Learning Data Science: Understanding the Basics
